aboutpara:
I am a passionate professional, with an initial background in electrical engineering and industrial computing. My curiosity then led me to broaden my horizons by obtaining a bachelor's and master's degree in logistics engineering. This diversity of knowledge has allowed me to develop a holistic approach to problem-solving, combining technical skills with an understanding of processes.

Building on my academic background, I decided to take on new challenges by embarking on a career change into web development. This bold choice stems from my passion for technology and my constant desire to improve in an ever-evolving environment.

Today, I thrive in web development, leveraging my technical skills acquired over the years and my ability to quickly learn new technologies. I am motivated by creating exceptional user experiences and solving complex problems.

My unconventional path has enabled me to develop a creative and innovative approach to my work while maintaining essential technical rigor. I am convinced that my versatility and passion for web development make me a valuable asset for any ambitious project.
